message_1: What is the median of the following dataset of exam scores: 75, 83, 92, 68, 90, 87, 80, 79?
message_2:
To find the median, we first need to arrange the dataset in ascending order:

68, 75, 79, 80, 83, 87, 90, 92

Since there are 8 numbers in the dataset (an even number), the median will be the average of the two middle numbers (4th and 5th numbers in this case):

(80 + 83) / 2 = 163 / 2 = 81.5

The median of the dataset is 81.5.
